classroom.name: h1
classroom.style: color: white; font-weight: bold; font-size: 56px; line-height: 58px; letter-spacing: 2px; margin: 0;

classroom.name: button1
classroom.style: color: white; font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; letter-spacing: 1px; height: 48px; max-width: 160px; width: 100%; border: none; display:flex; align-items:center; justify-content: center; text-decoration: none;

classroom.name: cart-product-container-item
classroom.style: display: flex; width: 100%; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center;

classroom.name: cart-product-container-item-product-div-section
classroom.style: display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center;

classroom.name: hero-cart-div-count-div
classroom.style: max-width: 120px; background-color: #F1F1F1; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; width:100%; min-height: 100%;

classroom.name: hero-cart-div-count-div2
classroom.style: max-width: 96px; background-color: #F1F1F1; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; width:100%; min-height: 32px;

classroom.name: hero-cart-div-count-buttons
classroom.style: border: none; font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgba(0,0,0,0.25); cursor: pointer; transition: 150ms; margin-inline: 12.5px;

classroom.name: hero-cart-div-count-buttons2
classroom.style: font-family: Manrope; border: none; font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgba(0,0,0,0.25); cursor: pointer; transition: 150ms; margin-inline: 6px;

classroom.name: hero-cart-div-count-input
classroom.style: border: none; text-align: center; outline:none; width: 40px; padding:0; margin:0; font-family: Manrope; font-size: 13px; font-weight:bold; letter-spacing: 1px; background-color: transparent;
